sentences.en: Get out of here or I'll tan your hide.
His teeth were a gleaming flash of white against his tan.
sentences.cn: 他的牙齿在他棕褐色皮肤的映衬下白得发亮.

sentences.en: I wish I could get a tan like that.
sentences.cn: 但愿我也能晒成那样的棕褐色肤色。

sentences.en: I'd take down your pants and tan your backside good proper.
sentences.cn: 我非扒掉你的裤子,好好打你一顿屁股不可.

sentences.en: Jack disrobed to get a good sun - tan on the beach.
sentences.cn: 杰克脱去衣服在海边晒成褐色皮肤.

sentences.en: Leigh rolled over on her stomach to tan her back.
sentences.cn: 莉翻了个身趴下，开始晒后背。

sentences.en: Male models used to be gorgeous — all chiselled jaw, perfect pecs and golden tan.
sentences.cn: 以前男模是很帅的——都有着棱角分明的下巴、完美的胸肌和金棕色的皮肤。

sentences.en: My job is to tan leather in the leather processing company .
sentences.cn: 我在这家皮革加工厂里鞣革。

sentences.en: She has a pale skin which doesn’t tan easily.
sentences.cn: 她的肤色很白，不容易被晒黑。

sentences.en: She is tall and blonde, with a permanent tan.
sentences.cn: 她高个儿，一头金发，皮肤黝黑。

sentences.en: She smeared sun tan lotion all over herself.
She was a small girl with a warm golden tan skin.
sentences.cn: 她是个娇小的姑娘,皮肤呈暖调的金黄色.

sentences.en: Tanners tan hides to make leather shoes.
sentences.cn: 制革工人硝皮以制作皮鞋.

sentences.en: These shoes are tan, not dark brown.
sentences.cn: 这些鞋是棕黄色的, 不是深褐色的.

sentences.en: With almost evangelical fervour, Marks warns against deliberately seeking a tan.
sentences.cn: 几乎是凭着一股疯狂的热情，马克斯警告人们不要刻意追求晒成一身古铜色。

words.tran_cn: 被晒成棕褐色的；深褐色的；已鞣制的
制革；制革法；皮肤晒成褐色
鞣革；把…晒黑；鞭笞（tan的ing形式）
棕褐色；[皮革]鞣料；马戏团

trans.tran_cn: 黄褐色的，棕黄色的，鞣皮的
黄褐色，棕黄色，鞣料，马戏团，晒黑的皮色
trans.tran_en: the attractive brown colour that someone with pale skin gets after they have been in the sun

trans.tran_cn: 晒成棕褐色， 晒黑； 硝
trans.tran_en: if you tan, or if the sun tans you, your skin becomes darker because you spend time in the sun
if you tan, or if the sun tans you, your skin becomes darker because you spend time in the sun
if you tan, or if the sun tans you, your skin becomes darker because you spend time in the sun
